txt.en: 'Thrymm! Nooo... what have you done to him?'
'I will not stand for this! I shall handle this myself. This creature will have to take my life to get past me!'
'Ill things are afoot, [placeholder], and there is a terrible chill in the air. Do you feel the ground tremble beneath our feet?'
'[placeholder], hold. Speak with Grimgar and see how he's holding up. I shall press on and slay the Orcs near the southern stables.'
'[placeholder], swiftly now! We must protect the people in the Mead Hall!'
'This is it, we are the last line of defence, [placeholder]! Cynegar and Garsig will attempt to stop the giant. We must defend the folk in the Mead Hall with our lives!'
'Something is breaching the gate! Humbald, to arms!'
'Love, there is nothing we can do. He has sworn to protect his people with his life. We must stay here and guard the women and children within the Mead Hall.'
'What is this new evil come to our lands? We must stop it here!'
'I must draw the giant away from Scylfig before all is lost. My dear Cyneberg, keep our people safe, they shall have need of a leader like you.'
'My love, you can't let him do this! We must stop him!'
